Title: Aged Brie decreases in quality and SellIn not reduced
Steps:
1. Create item 'Aged Brie' with SellIn 5, Quality 49
2. Run updateQuality once
Expected: Quality should increase to 50 and SellIn decrease by 1
Actual: Quality decreases to 47 and SellIn stays the same

Title: Backstage wrong increase steps for SellIn 6..10 and >10
Steps:
1. Create item 'Backstage passes to a TAFKAL80ETC concert' with SellIn 10, Quality 20
2. Run updateQuality once
3. Repeat with SellIn 15, Quality 20
Expected:
For SellIn 10 Quality should increase by 2 (to 22)
For SellIn 15 Quality should increase by 1 (to 21)
Actual:
For SellIn 10 Quality increases only by 1
For SellIn 15 Quality stays the same
